SELECT user_comment.id AS commentId, info.product_id AS productId, info.id AS reservationInfoId, user_comment.score AS score, user_comment.comment AS comment, info.reservation_name AS reservationName, info.reservation_tel AS reservationTelephone, info.reservation_email AS reservationEmail, info.reservation_date AS reservationDate, info.create_date AS createDate, info.modify_date AS modifyDate FROM reservation_info as info INNER JOIN reservation_user_comment as user_comment ON user_comment.reservation_info_id = info.id WHERE info.product_id = #{id}

SELECT file_info.content_type AS contentType, file_info.create_date AS createDate, file_info.delete_flag AS deleteFlag, file_info.id AS fileId, file_info.file_name AS fileName, comment_image.id AS imageId, file_info.modify_date AS modifyDate, user_comment.reservation_info_id AS reservationInfoId, user_comment.id AS reservationUserCommentId, file_info.save_file_name AS saveFileName FROM reservation_user_comment as user_comment INNER JOIN reservation_user_comment_image as comment_image ON comment_image.reservation_user_comment_id = user_comment.id INNER JOIN file_info ON comment_image.file_id = file_info.id WHERE user_comment.id = #{id}
SELECT description AS productDescription FROM product WHERE id = #{id}
